summary: Force recruit any NPC to fight for you.
descriptionHtml:
NEW VERSION!
2.0 DOWNLOAD NOW!

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53532/?




Recruit up to 9 followers to fight for you using the Follow/Dismiss spell. Give them items by using the Inventory spell. Now if you need help during a quest, you can make the quest givers help you lol.

===============
Version Changes
===============

-----
V1.2
-----

Fixed Compatibility Issues.

Now compatible with all DLC and Follower mods like UFO (Ultimate Follower Overhaul).

-----
V1.5
-----

NPC automatically heals outside of combat.

NPC now uses idle chatter and isn't completely silent (EX: React to dead body).

Can now Recruit one non-hostile animal. (EX: Bunny)

---------------------
Coming in V2.0
----------------------

Wait and Relax Spell.

=============
DISCLAIMER!
=============

THIS IS NOT MY WORK! I UPLOADED ONTO NEXUSMODS SO OTHER PEOPLE CAN DOWNLOAD AND I AM CURRENTLY APPLYING FIXES AND MAKING IT BETTER FOR THE DLC AND FOLLOWER MODS LIKE UFO.

I CREDIT THE AUTHOR OF THIS MOD, MADTARO, FOR HIS AMAZING WORK.

AGAIN, THANK MADTARO FOR THIS AMAZING MOD!

============
CREDITS
============

MadTaro

Mad Follow Spells V1.2

http://www.madtaro.net/skyrim.htm


============
INSTALLATION
============

Place the Data Folder inside your Skyrim root directory.

Enable FollowSpell.esp using Nexus Mod Manager or the Skyrim Launcher.


=============
HOW DO I USE?
=============

Upon loading a save game, or making a new game, you should have 2 spells:

----------------
Follow/Dismiss

Inventory
----------------

The names are pretty self explanatory. Use follow spell on someone for them to follow you. Use it again to dismiss them.

Use inventory to open up their inventory and give them shit or steal their shit.

=================
WHY USE THIS MOD
=================

MadTaro worked very hard on this mod and it is amazingly done.

The recruited NPC keeps the same stats and whether he is essential or not and leaves with the same stats, so you don't really break any Quests unless they are killed (most likely not because they might be essential).

You can force recruit any NPC and let them fight for you.

Now you can have that army of Whiterun Guards you wanted, or army of Beggars revolting against the High King with daggers.

This mod keeps the NPC's regular dialogue so it's pretty funny hearing my Populated Land's Merchant seeing a dead body and saying:

"Better this one than me".

So please endorse and share the mod for others to see!
